name: Pirate Rush
description:
A simple Browser Game where you try to reach the Treasure in under 1 Minute!

You are a Pirate and have to manouver your Galleon around Sea Monsters and other Obstacles to reach the Reward at the Finish!

But beware, you have only 1 minute to reach the goal or it will be forever lost! Can you be the greatest Pirate in this 2D Mobile-Friendly browser game?
